title: Emma Weymouth's Strictly Diary: 'From Strictly to soft play in the blink of an eye’
text:
The Viscountess on juggling dance and family and basing her next dance on her children’s energy

Thankfully, last week’s Downton dance went down a storm! Aljaž and I are so grateful for all the lovely messages and the all-important votes. Hours and hours of trying to master the slow Foxtrot’s tricky timing paid off with our highest score. As it was Movie Week, the characterisation was everything, and it was an emotional experience.

The beautiful Downton Abbey score, combined with the frustrating technicalities of the dance, provided some true emotional highs and lows. On Saturday at the Elstree studio, I visualised the dance over and over in my dressing room between reminders from runners to rush...
description: The Viscountess on juggling dance and family and basing her next dance on her children’s energy
